messages.subject: Working on unschooling was Christian and Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Heather wrote: Has anyone else felt that they were working on unschooling - as far as interactions within the family -(not the academic side) letting go of
messages.messageBody:
Heather wrote: Has anyone else felt that they were working on
"unschooling" - as far as interactions within the family -(not the
academic side) letting go of restrictions or controls measure etc.

Ha! I'm thinking that at least 95% of the people who have joined this
list. Starting right about the time they join this list.

I just never knew how much I controlled my kids until I joined this
list! I'm not regretful at how I've raised them so far, but I'm glad
for a new perspective. I'm also glad they are 8 & 12. Young enough to
(hopefully) fully recover and shine, and old enough to pretty much
"get" what I'm working on now.

Joni Zander
FotoCEO@...
